topics.body:
I prefer Coke over Pepsi (especially Vanilla Cokes), but I'll drink either one if provided.

_Which reminds me..._

I need to mix Coke and Pepsi together, and eat a bowl mix of M&Ms and Skittles with it.
And laugh like an evil maniac while doing so.
In public.
Without any pity, remorse, or regrets.

topics.body:
Lipton Ice Lemon Tea. 

This is what I drink last year to replace any carbonated drinks. 

I wasn't allowed to drink anything carbonated last year so all I had was that.
And also lychee juice.
